Detailed Description

The section has a list of all internal API which are not exposed to the external applications.

Function Documentation

static uint32_t CRC_getCRCDataSelectBitValue ( CRC_DataLen  dataLen)
static

Description
Utility function which is used to map the data length enumeration into the value which is to be written into the CRC_CTRL0 register. This is coded as per the CRC register definitions.

Parameters
[in]dataLenData Length to be coded
Return values
Translatedbit value
static uint32_t CRC_getCRCTypeBitValue ( CRC_Type  crcType)
static

Description
Utility function which is used to map the CRC Type enumeration into the value which is to be written into the CRC_CTRL0 register. This is coded as per the CRC register definitions.

Parameters
[in]crcTypeCRC Type to be coded
Return values
Translatedbit value
static volatile uint32_t * CRC_getSignatureRegister ( const CRC_Driver *  ptrCRCDriver)
static

Description
Utility function which is used to get the signature register corresponding to the CRC Channel.

Parameters
[in]ptrCRCDriverPointer to the CRC Driver
Return values
Signatureregister
static uint32_t CRC_isTransactionIdValid ( CRC_Driver *  ptrCRCDriver,
uint32_t  transactionId 
)
static

Description
The function is used to match the transaction identifer to determine if it is valid or not. The Transaction identifier is considered to be valid only under the following conditions:-

  • Valid CRC Driver Handle
  • CRC Driver is in use
  • Transaction Id matches the Driver Active Transaction Id.
Parameters
[in]ptrCRCDriverPointer to the CRC Driver
[in]transactionIdTransaction Id to be validated
Return values
0- Transaction Id is not valid
1- Transaction Id is valid
static void CRC_releaseTransactionId ( CRC_Driver *  ptrCRCDriver)
static

Description
The function is used to release a transaction identifier which had been allocated earlier and is used to mark the driver as free.

Parameters
[in]ptrCRCDriverPointer to the CRC Driver
Return values
Notapplicable
static void CRC_resetSignature ( const CRC_Driver *  ptrCRCDriver)
static

Description
Utility function which is used to reset the signature channel

Parameters
[in]ptrCRCDriverPointer to the CRC Driver
Return values
Notapplicable
static int32_t CRC_validateParams ( const CRC_Config *  ptrCRCCfg)
static

Description
The function is used to validate the CRC configuration

Parameters
[in]ptrCRCCfgPointer to the CRC configuration which is validated
Return values
Success- 0
Error- <0
